dialogue.speaker: Protagonist
dialogue.text: Welcome to the land of Eridoria, a mystical realm of ancient magic and forgotten lore.

dialogue.speaker: Mentor
dialogue.text: Greetings young adventurer. I sense that you possess a special gift, one that could be the key to saving our world from darkness.

dialogue.speaker: Protagonist
dialogue.text: What do you mean? What kind of darkness?

dialogue.speaker: Mentor
dialogue.text: The Shadow Kingdom, a realm of dark sorcery and malevolent beings, threatens to engulf our world. But with your help, we may yet stand a chance against the coming darkness.
